subject: Monuments and Memorials (Structures)
Uniforms
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Besides retiring the number worn by Joe Torre as manager, the team said it would honor Rich Gossage, Tino Martinez and Paul O’Neill with plaques in Monument Park.
snippet: Besides retiring the number worn by Joe Torre as manager, the team said it would honor Rich Gossage, Tino Martinez and Paul O’Neill with plaques in Monument Park.
